headerDisplay: This plugin maps [API keys of a Signal K server](https://github.com/Krillle/homebridge-signalk/blob/master/README.md#mapped-api-keys-and-devices) to matching HomeKit devices.
footerDisplay: For help or in case of issues please visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Krillle/homebridge-signalk/issues).

host.title: Signal K Host
host.description: Hostname or IP address and port of your Signal K server

ssl.title: Signal K Host Uses SSL
ssl.description: Check if Signal K server is awaiting connections via SSL

accessRequest.title: Use Access Requests to access Signal K server
accessRequest.description: Check if Homebridge shall use Access Requests to request and be granted access to the Signal K server

securityToken.title: Signal K Security Token
securityToken.description: A token is needed to switch switches or dimmers. Create your token with signalk-generate-token.

removeDevicesNotPresent.title: Remove Devices Not Present in Signal K
removeDevicesNotPresent.description: If checked, devices which are not present in Signal K (after restart of Signal K server) are removed from HomeKit (at start of Homebridge server). Uncheck to prevent devices disappearing when restarting Raspberry Pi in case homebridge loads faster than the Signal K tree is being filled.

signalkInitializeDelay.title: Signal K API Delay
signalkInitializeDelay.description: Delay before adding or removing devices to give Signal K time to fill the API tree (in milliseconds)

autodetectNewAccessoriesInterval.title: Detecting New Devices Interval
autodetectNewAccessoriesInterval.description: Interval to check for new devices (in milliseconds)

accessRequestInterval.title: Access Request Interval
accessRequestInterval.description: Interval to check Signal K access request status (in milliseconds)

emptyBatteryVoltage.title: Empty Battery Voltage
emptyBatteryVoltage.description: Voltage at which battery state of charge will be shown as 0% (ignored if SOC is reported from battery)

fullBatteryVoltage.title: Full Battery Voltage
fullBatteryVoltage.description: Voltage at which battery state of charge will be shown as 100% (ignored if SOC is reported from battery)

lowBatteryVoltage.title: Low Battery Voltage
lowBatteryVoltage.description: Voltage below wich a battery low warning will be shown

chargingBatteryVoltage.title: Charging Battery Voltage
chargingBatteryVoltage.description: Voltage above wich batteries will be shown as charging (ignored if current is reported from battery)

lowFreshWaterLevel.title: Fresh Water Low Level
lowFreshWaterLevel.description: Percent level below wich fresh water tanks will show a warning

highWasteWaterLevel.title: Waster Water High Level
highWasteWaterLevel.description: Percent level above wich waste water tanks will show a warning

highBlackWaterLevel.title: Black Water High Level
highBlackWaterLevel.description: Percent level above wich black water tanks will show a warning

lowFuelLevel.title: Fuel Low Level
lowFuelLevel.description: Percent level below wich fuel tanks will show a warning

lowLubricationLevel.title: Lubrication Low Level
lowLubricationLevel.description: Percent level below wich lubrication tanks will show a warning

lowLiveWellLevel.title: Fuel Live Well Level
lowLiveWellLevel.description: Percent level below wich live well tanks will show a warning

lowGasLevel.title: Fuel Gas Level
lowGasLevel.description: Percent level below wich gas tanks will show a warning

lowBallastLevel.title: Fuel Ballast Level
lowBallastLevel.description: Percent level below wich ballast tanks will show a warning

contactSensors.title: Contact Sensors
contactSensors.description: Set up contact sensors which are triggered when a Signal K API key reaches a threshold value.

key.title: API Key
key.description: Signal K API key for which you want to see a contact sensor device in HomeKit

name.title: Name
name.description: Name to be shown for this contact sensor device in HomeKit

oneOf.title: Less than or equal to treshold (<=)
Greater than or equal to treshold (>=)

ignoredPaths.title: Ignored API Keys
ignoredPaths.description: Signal K API keys for which you don't want to see a device in HomeKit. Associated devices will be deleted from HomeKit if already present.
